long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Previously "YouTube Quick Search" (see note below)

Search on YouTube

No need to tediously open a new tab or window to search a highlighted word/text on YouTube.
Just use this extension!

1) Mark any text in your browser

2) Right-click on it 

3) Press "Search on YouTube"

Note:
This extension needed to be renamed from "YouTube Quick Search" to "Video Quick Search" and change the icon because of trademark claims by Google. It may change back to its original name as soon as the trademark issue is sorted out.
